intro: Over the course of my life, I've cut down hundreds of trees.
I've found small items, baddies, and sometimes... sometimes, even wood!
But I've never found any secrets. I don't think there are any...
But I'd be very happy if you proved me wrong!
dialogue: Cut some wood for me! Chop chop!
questComplete: I can't believe it! I'm so excited!
I think I'm gonna go cut some wood right now!
Here, you should keep this. Someone might need it.
